name: TechGenius
0:
”Alexa, open Tech Genius”
”Alexa, start Tech Genius”
”Alexa, launch Tech Genius”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tech genius
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you often happen to be asked recommendations from friends and family about which new high tech item to purchase? It can be a smartphone, a laptop or a smart band/watch. We have been through that before, and that's how Tech Genius was born. Never spend a minute of your time browsing, just send them a link to Tech Genius Alexa Skill!
This skill guides you through a very easy to follow set of questions to determine your best fit, then recommends the best buy option for tech items on Amazon depending on your budget and your needs: you will receive the suggestion via email, so you will be able to take your time to evaluate and purchase later.
